original_text: made us alive with Christ even when we were dead in transgressions—it is by grace you have been saved.
korean_text: 허물로 죽은 우리를 그리스도와 함께 살리셨고 (너희는 은혜로 구원을 받은 것이라)

sentences.original_text: made us alive with Christ even when we were dead in transgressions
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 범죄 가운데 죽었을 때에 그리스도와 함께 살리셨고

sentences.original_text: it is by grace you have been saved
